channel.title: Women – Serenity
channel.description: Love Gives Life Within - Modern stylish clothes for people who love to live.

item.title: The Cashmere Crop Mockneck
item.dc:creator: killahb308
item.description: This Grade-A cashmere mockneck is slightly oversized, with a relaxed but playful cropped cut that we love. It looks especially great with high-waisted pants.
item.content:encoded:
• Model is 5′10″Wearing size S
  • Oversized fit
  • 100% grade-A Mongolian cashmereDry clean
  • Signature reversed stitching detail on the cuffs
  • Made in Dongguan, China

item.title: The Classic French Terry Sweatpant
item.dc:creator: killahb308
item.description: A better sweatpant. We looked to classic sportswear to created this French terry essential, with an easy straight fit and ribbed ankle cuffs. Wear it to the track, the gym, or that store that sells ice cream late.
item.content:encoded:
• Model is 5′10″ – Wearing size S
  • 100% cotton – Machine wash cold, tumble dry low
  • Made in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

item.title: The GoWeave Crop Trouser
item.dc:creator: killahb308
item.description: Polished yet comfortable, this will be the pant you’re always reaching for. GoWeave™ yarn is tightly spun in Italy, creating a wool twill that is wrinkle-resistant and astonishingly smooth. It's a mid rise trouser, sitting right at the waist. It's slim through the hip and thigh, with a straight leg that hits right above the ankle. The trouser features a fully-constructed waistband, full-length front seam, two front side pockets, two back pockets, and is unlined.
item.content:encoded:
• Model is 5′10″ – Wearing size 2
  • Slim fit – 27″ inseam
  • 100% wool – GoWeave wool is wrinkle-resistant and astonishingly smooth – Dry clean only
  • Made in Suzhou, China

item.title: The Petra Backpack
item.dc:creator: killahb308
item.description: Ease meets elegance with this new luxury backpack. It features ultrasuede lining, feet to protect the bag's base, a hidden loop for secure closure, an interior snap pocket, and a top handle for easy carry by hand. There is gunmetal-finish hardware on the leather drawstrings and at the feet.
item.content:encoded:
• 9” W × 5.5” D × 10.5” H27” – Strap length, adjustable to 27 1/2″4″ – Top handle drop
  • 100% full-grain – Italian leather, ultrasuede lining – To clean, wipe dry with a damp cloth; for best results, apply a leather conditioner and water repellent spray before using and after each cleaning
  • Does not fit a laptop
  • Made in Vicenza, Italy

item.title: The Petra Magazine
item.dc:creator: killahb308
item.description: An elegant take on the go-everywhere tote. It features tonal ultrasuede lining, two canvas pockets with snap closures, and polished chrome hardware at straps and feet.
item.content:encoded:
• 5.5″ W Top, 11″ W Bottom, 14″ H – Handle Drop: 9″, adjustable by 2″
  • 100% Italian leather exterior, ultra-suede lining – To clean, wipe dry with a damp cloth; for best results, apply a leather conditioner and water repellent spray before using and after each cleaning
  • Made in Vicenza, Italy

item.title: The Soft Cotton Square Crew
item.dc:creator: killahb308
item.description: The year-round layer. Our easy cotton sweater has an oversized cropped fit and elegant drape, so you can pair it with pretty much everything in your closet.
item.content:encoded:
• Model is 5′10″Wearing size S
  • Oversized fit
  • 100% cottonHand wash cold, lay flat to dry
  • Made in Dongguan, China
